column1: Smoque BBQ////They have their own parking lot
column2: and we had no trouble with street parking. Walking up to the restaurant
column3: the outdoor seating section looked lovely (unfortunately
column4: it was full - at 5:30 PM on a Friday
column5: so go early). We walked inside and were told by the busboys they'd "seat us" after we placed an order
column6: but the inside was completely empty and basically had cafeteria-style seating
column8: um...okay. Dress code? Feel free to show up in your sweatpants (not necessarily a complaint
